text: The A.S. Noon Building is a historic building in Nogales, Arizona. It was built in 1915 for A. S. Noon, and designed in the Chicago school architectural style. With One of the stores was owned by Wing Wong, a Chinese merchant. The building has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since August 29, 1985. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Santa Cruz County, Arizona Category:Chicago school architecture in the United States Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1915 Category:1915 establishments in Arizona
title: A.S. Noon Building
